description:
http://anidb.net/ch7217 [Shirahama Ken`ichi] is an average student who has earned the nickname "Weak Legs" from always getting bullied. One day he meets a cute girl named http://anidb.net/ch7218 [Fuurinji Miu] who helps him build the courage to begin training at a mysterious dojo where she lives. Here Kenichi faces intense training from masters of many different martial arts styles as he attempts to become stronger.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi`s been called out by a thug in the karate club. He has one week to toughen up, or he`s dead meat. Not every weakling gets a chance to change his fortunes, but Kenichi just might.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ryouzanpaku! Gouketsu no Tsudoishi Basho
Ryouzanpaku, donde se reúnen los poderosos
Ryozanpaku: Where the Powerful Gather!
Treffpunkt für Mutige und Ehrgeizige! Der Ort, an dem sich Helden treffen
梁山泊! 豪傑の集いし場所

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi`s got less than a week until his fight, and his new masters seem determined to teach him everything in the world besides how to use a fist!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Schritt vorwärts! Beginn des Kampfes!
Ippo Saki e! Tatakai no Hajimari
The Beginning of the Fight!
Un paso adelante. El primer combate
一歩先へ! 闘いの始まり

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi`s grueling training regimen is making it tough to stand, but the training is about to get even more intense - the masters are ready to show him some new techniques.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chikara to Yuuki! Seigi o Tsumareku Tame ni
Fuerza y valor para la justicia
Strength and Courage! For the Sake of Justice!
Stärke und Mut! Recht bewahren
力と勇気! 正義を貫くために

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi`s ambition impresses even the most skeptical of his masters and he`s learning to bring his lessons to life. But across town, a notorious gang of thugs is looking to teach him another kind of lesson!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Combate infernal. Debes lograrlo
Fight to Survive! It`s Whether You Do It or You Don`t!
Kenka Jigoku! Yaru ka Yaranai ka Da
Kämpferhölle! Leben oder sterben
ケンカ地獄! やるかやらないかだ

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi`s spirits are pretty low after so many fights. Luckily, the masters have a plan: in order to boost his spirits, the Ryozanpaku back-breakers are going to play match-maker!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Date?! You`d Better Score!
Date? Kimechimaeyo!
Eine Date? Muss vorankommen!
Retirada estratégica. La cita
デート? きめちまえよ!

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi`s life is good at the dojo, especially when Miu cooks dinner. After a grueling day of training, he gets a chance to hear her dreams - and during a rare moment of peace, he helps one come true.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Day at Ryozanpaku! The Rooftop Dream!
Ein Tag im Ryouzanpaku! Der Traum auf dem Dach!
Ryouzanpaku no Ichinichi! Yane no Ue no Yume
Un día en el Ryouzanpaku. Un sueño bajo techo
梁山泊での一日! 屋根の上の夢

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi finds the serenity of his beloved greenhouse shattered by Ragnarok thugs! The chumps threaten to take Kenichi back to the gang`s clubhouse by force, and it gets worse when the punks start eyeing Miu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Combate en el club de jardinería. El combate de la venganza
Hot Battle at the Gardening Club! A Return Match!
Kampf! Die Gang schlägt zurück!
Nettou Engei Bu Return Match
熱闘園芸部 リターンマッチ

REGULAR.description:
Ragnarok`s actions are getting way more intense - some of the jerks are even willing to pull knives. Luckily, Kenichi knows real strength is more subtle than a blade, and sometimes one finger is all you need.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amazing Bodies! The Mysterious Masters!
Beeindruckende Muskeln! Geheimnis des Meisters
Cuerpos sobrehumanos. Los maestros misteriosos
Kyoui no Nikutai, Nazo no Shishou-tachi
驚異の肉体 謎の師匠達

REGULAR.description:
Apachai finally gets a chance to train Kenichi, and just in time - agents of Ragnarok are prowling the halls of his school, roughing up anyone unlucky enough to catch their eye.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Apa-apa-apa! El entrenamiento de Apachai
Apapapa! Apachai`s Training!
Apapapa! Apachais Training
Apapapa~ Apachai no Shuugyou
アパパパ~ アパチャイの修行

REGULAR.description:
The bell is about to ring on Kenichi`s biggest fight yet. In this corner: Takeda, a former pro boxer with a mysterious past. It`s going to be a slaughter unless Kenichi can pinpoint the pugilist`s weakness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Go, Kenichi! A Boxer`s Weakness!
Hashire Ken`ichi, Boxer no Jakuten
Renn, Kenichi! Die Schwäche eines Boxers
Vamos Kenichi! La debilidad del boxeador
走れケンイチ ボクサーの弱点

REGULAR.description:
What makes a pro athlete trade his dreams for a life as a Ragnarok goon? Takeda has no problem sharing the tragic tale - just like he`s got no problem pummeling Kenichi in a rooftop brawl.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Faust des Verrats! Takedas traurige Vergangenheit
El puño de la traición. El triste pasado de Takeda
The Fists of Betrayal! Takeda`s Sorrowful Past!
Uragiri no Kobushi, Takeda no Kanashiki Kako
裏切りの拳 武田の悲しき過去

REGULAR.description:
Following Takeda`s failure, Ragnarok goes to Plan B: Kill Kenichi. A brawler named Tsuji is dispatched to deal with the kid once and for all. Little do his commanders know, Tsuji has a Plan C of his own creation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Enemy! Shinnosuke Tsuji!
Arata Naru Teki! Tsuji Shinnosuke
Ein neuer Gegner! Tsuji Shinnosuke!
Un nuevo enemigo. Shinnosuke Tsuji
新たなる敵! 辻新之助

REGULAR.description:
When Kenichi wakes after the fight with Tsuji, he`s badly wounded both in body and pride. The masters know it`s time to begin a new training regimen: Martial Arts or Death.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El combate. Las reglas de un combate verdadero
Kenka Satsuhou! Jissen no Okite
Killer-Kampftechniken! Regeln eines Kampfes!
The Way of the Fight! The Rules of the Real Fight!
ケンカ殺法! 実戦の掟

REGULAR.description:
The masters want Kenichi to live at the dojo, soaking in the day to day struggle of the fighting life. The idea doesn`t strike Kenichi as a good one until Kensei points out a hidden benefit: Sharing a roof with Miu!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arriesgando la vida en entrenamiento. Baños mixtos
Dedicated Training! And a Nearby Hot Spring Bath!
Ehrgeiziges Training und eine heiße Quelle!
Inochikage no Shyugyou! Kon`yaku mo tsuitemasu
命懸けの修行! 混浴もついてます

REGULAR.description:
When Honoka infiltrates Ryozanpaku to figure out why Kenichi moved away from home, she can`t help but cringe as he gets beat down over and over - but she knows her big brother never stays down for long.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honoka Infiltrates Ryozanpaku!
Honoka Sennyuu! Ryouzanpaku Dajo
Honoka schleicht sich ein! Ryouzanpakus Gast
Honoka se infiltra en el Ryouzanpaku
ほのか潜入! 梁山泊だじょ

REGULAR.description:
The authorities from Miu`s school are coming to investigate the rumors they`ve heard about Ryozanpaku. If she can`t prove her living situation to be normal, her entire education is at risk.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El grave peligro que enfrenta el Ryouzanpaku
Ryouzanpaku Saidai no Kiki!!?
Ryouzanpakus größte Krise!!?
Ryozanpaku Faces the Greatest Crisis?!
梁山泊最大の危機!!?

REGULAR.description:
The masters are away, so Kenichi and Miu must defend Ryozanpaku when a rival dojo attacks! Miu stays cool, but Kenichi has that look in his eyes. The number one disciple will defend his turf.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beschützt das Schild! Angriff auf das Dojo!
El asalto al dojo
Mamore Kanban! Doujouyaburi Shuurai!
Protect the Name! Attack of the Dojo Challengers!
守れ看板! 道場破り襲来!

REGULAR.description:
The gang sets off to a private island for some sand and surf action, but Kenichi has one more test to pass before he can get around to rubbing sunscreen on Miu`s back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Paradise? To the Mysterious Furinji Island!
Rakuen??? Hikyou Furinji Shima e
Vacaciones. La misteriosa isla Furinji
Vergnügen??? Auf zur geheimen Furinji-Insel!
楽園??? 秘境・風林寺島へ

REGULAR.description:
Ragnarok is preparing for war. The gang of delinquents is stronger than ever, their ranks bolstered by the promotion of a tough girl named Kisara - and she`s got Kenichi and Takeda in her sights.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die stärksten Ragnaröks! Die Ankunft der acht Fäuste!
Los más fuertes de Ragnarok. Los ocho puños
Ragnarok Saikyou no Sha, Hachi Kobushi Gou Kenzan!
The Strongest of the Ragnarok! Here Come the Eight Greatest Fists!
ラグナレク最強の者八拳豪見参!

REGULAR.description:
What makes a fighter stand above his foes? Some are blessed with natural skill. Others must depend on perseverance. As Takeda ponders these thoughts, he will face a demon from the past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Takeda en peligro. El castigo por la traición
Takeda in Danger! The Rules of Revenge!
Takeda in Gefahr! Regeln der Rache!
Takeda no Kiki! Houfuku no Okite!
武田の危機! 報復の掟!

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi is rushing to Takeda`s aid as the boxer faces off with the Ragnarok squad. He may thrash his way through the foot soldiers, but Kisara waits for her chance to punish Takeda`s betrayal.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lo imperdonable. La furia de Kenichi
Unforgivable! Kenichi`s Fists of Fury!
Unverzeihlich!! Kenichis wütende Faust!
Yurusanai!! Ken`ichi Ikari no Kobushi!
許さない!! ケンイチ怒りの拳!

REGULAR.description:
Niijima has created an army - The Shinpaku Alliance. With Kenichi`s brawn and his own brain, Niijima figures their path to legend is certain. Kenichi knows better - and Ragnarok`s troubled by the clique, too.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gather, Young Men! The New Shinpaku Alliance!
Junge Leute versammeln! Formation der Shinpaku-Allianz!
La reunión. La nueva Federación Shinpaku
Tsudoe Wakoudo! Shinpaku Rengou Kessei!
集え若人! 新白連合結成!

REGULAR.description:
When Niijima and Izumi visit Ryozanpaku, you could cut the tension with a sword. Miu and Izumi trade a few uneasy smiles, but Kenichi might have to intervene before they start trading blows!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ANGRIFF! Das benachbarte Ryouzanpaku!
Assault! The Next Door Ryozanpaku!
Invasión al Ryouzanpaku
Totsugeki! Tonari no Ryouzanpaku!
突撃! となりの梁山泊!

REGULAR.description:
Bullies are targeting the Drama Club, trashing sets and picking on actors. Kenichi is willing to protect the thespians, even if it means buddying up with Tanimoto, a handsome Romeo who wants Miu to be his Juliet!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das gestohlene Herz! Miu ist Julia!
The Captured Heart! Miu`s Juliet!
Ubawareta Heart! Miu no Juliet!
Un corazón conquistado. Miu como Julieta
奪われたハート! 美羽のジュリエット

REGULAR.description:
Kisara`s crew is on the move, and they`re out to humiliate Miu on the day of her thespian debut. Kenichi must prevent the situation from turning into a tragedy - even if it means taking his final bow.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bleib stark, Kenichi! Mius Kuss
Proteger el corazón de Miu
Shishu Seyo Ken`ichi! Miu no Kuchibiru
Stand Strong, Kenichi! Miu`s Kiss!
死守せよケンイチ! 美羽のくちびる

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi`s most dangerous foe strikes! Hermit will settle for nothing less than the death of Ryozanpaku`s disciple. Before the fight ends, Hermit will test every skill Kenichi learned in his training.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cae la máscara. La verdadera identidad de Hermit
Entblößte Maske! Hermits wahre Identität!
Hasareta Kamen! Hermit no Shoutai!
The Stripped Mask! Hermit`s True Identity!
剥された仮面! ハーミットの正体!

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi follows Kensei out into the city as the master tracks down his estranged brother. Renka, Kensei`s tough daughter, and Kenichi can only watch as the siblings prepare to battle to the death.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gou VS Yawa! Kuuzenzetsugo no Kyoudaigenka!
Hard vs. Soft! Once-in-a-Lifetime Quarrel Between Brothers!
La batalla entre hermanos
Stahl vs. Muskeln! Vor der Dämmerung: Ein Kampf zwischen Brüdern!
剛VS柔! 空前絶後の兄弟喧嘩!

REGULAR.description:
On his way to meet a secret admirer, Kenichi must step in and protect his friends after some Ragnarok goons ambush Niijima and the Shinpaku Alliance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Kapitän greift an! Kampf im Restaurant
Here Comes the Shock Troop Commander! Battle Royal at the Restaurant!
Kiru Komu Taichou Sanjou! Rantou Restaurant
La Federación Shinpaku
斬り込み隊長参上! 乱闘レストラン

REGULAR.description:
Ragnarok captures Niijima and the gang`s preparing to ship him far, far away. Miu and Kenichi rush to the rescue - but Siegfried`s got plans to make Ryozanpaku`s disciple face the music.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der furchterregende Siegfried! Der Auftakt der Zerstörung
El terrible Siegfried. La destrucción
Osoreru Beshi Sieg! Hametsu e no Prelude
The Fearsome Siegfried! Prelude to Destruction!
恐るべしジーク! 破滅へのプレリュード

REGULAR.description:
Niijima`s still in trouble - and so is Kenichi. Siegfried`s reputation as an unbeatable opponent appears to be valid, and unless Kenichi can put his training to use like never before, his friend is doomed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Los frutos del entrenamiento. Imitación
Resultate des Trainings! Das Ergebnis von kleinen Schritten!
Shuugyou no Seika! Chiisaku Mae ni Narae!!
The Results of Training! Align Forward Half!
修行の成果! 小さく前にならえ!!

REGULAR.description:
Hermit returns from his self-imposed seclusion, eager to beat Kenichi once and for all. His time away was spent training, but nothing could prepare him for who he must deal with next - Honoka!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honoka Will Help You!
Honoka, Otetsudai Suru jo!
Honoka, ich rette dich!
Honoka, yo te ayudaré
ほのか, お手伝いするじょ!

REGULAR.description:
Tired of the torturous training, Kenichi runs away from Ryozanpaku - straight into the biggest fight of his life. Honoka`s in trouble, and if he wants to save her, Kenichi will have to get through Hermit first!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honoka en peligro. La trampa de Loki
Honoka in Gefahr! Lokis Plan
Honoka no Kiki! Loki no Bouryaku
Honoka`s in Danger! Loki`s Plot!
ほのかの危機! ロキの謀略

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi is taking a serious beating when Hermit shares the tragic tale of his childhood. With Honoka in real danger, Kenichi knows the time for words is over - he`ll let his fists do the talking.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Butsukero Ken`ichi! Ken wa Kataru!
Golpea fuerte, Kenichi! Que hablen tus puños
Kämpfe, Kenichi! Überlasse deinen Fäusten das Reden!
Strike, Kenichi! Fists Do the Talking!
ぶつけろケンイチ! 拳は語る!

REGULAR.description:
Loki attacks and Kenichi knows fighting back could get Honoka killed. With a knife at her throat, she`s a helpless pawn in Ragnarok`s deadly game, and the dirty strategy doesn`t sit well with Hermit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Give In! The Words Left by a Loved One!
Makenaide! Ai Suru Hito ga Nokoshita Kotoba
Nicht verlieren! Die letzten Worte eines geliebten Menschen
No pierdas! Las últimas palabras de un ser amado
負けないで! 愛する人が残した言葉

REGULAR.description:
Hermit quit Ragnarok and saved Honoka, but he still burns to settle the score with Kenichi. As the fight gets underway, one fact is clear: no matter who wins, each will soon have to face Odin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jamamono Nashi! Ima Koso Kecchaku no Toki
Keine Hindernisse! Die Zeit der Entscheidung
Sin interrupciones. Ahora acabemos con esto
There`s No One in Our Way! Now Is the Time to Settle the Fight!
邪魔者なし! 今こそ決着のとき

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi`s caught between two butt-kicking babes when Renka`s visit to Ryozanpaku rubs Miu the wrong way. The friction between them could start a fire. Luckily, the gang`s going to the water park!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: MIU VS RENKA!! Der Sturm des Liebesdreiecks
Miu VS Renka!! Arashi o Yobu Triangle
Miu contra Renka. El triángulo amoroso
Miu vs. Renka! The Love Triangle Creates a Storm!
美羽VS蓮華!! 嵐を呼ぶトライアングル

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi goes on the offensive! His first target is Thor, Ragnarok`s Seventh Fist. His massive bulk is dwarfed only by his skills as a Sumo wrestler - and Ryozanpaku`s disciple is taking the fight to him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dangerous Trap! Let`s Have Sumo Chanko Stew Together!
Gefährliche Falle! Lass uns ringen
Kiken na Yuuwaku Issho ni Chanko o!
Una invitación peligrosa. Comamos juntos
危険な誘惑 一緒にちゃんこを!

REGULAR.description:
The other Fists of Ragnarok are questioning Kisara`s loyalty. When she`s discovered spending time with Miu, thanks to their shared devotion to a stray kitten, Kisara`s former foes could be her only allies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cute Kitten! Hand-to-Hand Battle Among Women!
Das niedliche Kätzchen und der Kampf, Frau gegen Frau
El adorable gatito. El grupo de chicas
Kawaii Koneko, Onna-tachi no Nikudansen!
かわいい子猫 女たちの肉弾戦!

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi`s fight with the Walkyries won`t be an easy victory. He`s outnumbered, they`re carrying weapons, and he`s not into hitting girls. Luckily, none of that matters to Shigure.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El entrenamiento personal de Shigure
Shigure no Kojin Sazu... Gyou
Shigure`s Personal... Lesson!
Shigures persönliche... Lektion
しぐれの個人授... ぎょう♡

REGULAR.description:
Odin reveals his role in Kenichi`s past, and fond memories are shared - but the First Fist promises the future won`t be as pleasant.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das gelobte Land! Wo alles begann
El lugar de la promesa
The Place the Promise Was Made! Everything Started Here!
Yakusoku no Chi! Subete wa Koko kara
約束の地! すべてはここから

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi gives it his all against Odin, impressing the First Fist with his training - momentarily. Meanwhile, Niijima puts a plan in motion to lure Hermit into joining the Shinpaku Alliance!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El temible Seikouken. El dragón ha descendido
Seikouken no Kyoufu! Ryu wa Maiorita!
Seikuukens Terror! Der Tanz des Drachen!
Terror of the Sphere of Control! A Dragon Descends!
制空権の恐怖! 龍は舞い降りた!

REGULAR.description:
After the Masters start to worry that Kenichi is pushing himself too hard, Elder shocks everyone by offering to train Ryozanpaku`s disciple himself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chourou Tokkyuu! Kesshi no Yama Komori aa!
El venerable maestro. El viaje de retiro a montaña mortal
Elder`s Super Express! Do-or-Die Secluded Tour in the Mountains!
Vergnügen??? Auf zur geheimen Furinji-Insel!
長老特急! 決死の山篭りツアー

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi meets a mysterious master living within the forest, and the point of Elder`s training comes into focus: Kenichi is at a crossroads and the path he chooses will change his life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Am Limit! Asura, Weg der Versuchung
El inhibidor. El atractivo del lado oscuro
Limiter! Invitation to the World of Bloodshed!
Limiter! Shuradou e no Sasoi
リミッター! 修羅道への誘い

REGULAR.description:
With Kenichi still training deep in the mountains, his friends are on their own when Berserker leads a Ragnarok assault against the Shinpaku Alliance!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ataque a la Federación Shinpaku. Una amenaza acecha
Collapse of the Shinpaku Federation! The Crazy Fist Stealthily Approaches!
Jagd auf Shinpaku! Die schreckliche Faust naht
Shinpaku Rengou Houkai! Shinobi Yoru Kyouken
新白連合崩壊! 忍び寄る狂拳

REGULAR.description:
Thanks to Siegfried`s help, Niijima manages to escape Berserker - for now. Meanwhile, Kisara and Miu take on Freya and her Walkyrie minions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der entscheidende Angriff! Tanze, Kisara!
El golpe de la separación. Kisara baila
Ketsubetsu no Ichigeki! Kisara, Mau!
The Decisive Attack! Kisara Dances!
決別の一撃! キサラ, 舞う!

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi`s friends have never needed him more. Even with betrayal dividing Odin`s Ragnarok forces, the Shinpaku Alliance is way outmatched and facing their final stand!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adiós Niijima. Enfrentando al enemigo con decisión
Auf Wiedersehen! Niijima, bereit zum Kampf!
Farewell! A Determined Niijima Joins the Fray!
Saraba!! Niijima, Ketsui no Shutsujin
さらば!! 新島, 決意の出陣

REGULAR.description:
Kenichi is back on the scene and ready to face Odin, but the next fight of the day is between Hermit and Berserker.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Schwäche des Genies! Training überflügelt Talent!
La debilidad del genio. El esfuerzo triunfa sobre el talento
Tensai no Jakuten! Deryoku wa Sainou o Ryouga Suru!
The Weakness of the Genius! Effort Surpasses Talent!
天才の弱点! 努力は才能を凌駕する!

REGULAR.description:
As his friends rally behind him, Kenichi squares off with Odin. The fists fly at impossible speeds - but just as Ryozanpaku`s disciple gains the edge, Ragnarok`s deadliest Fist reveals his true power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Choujou Taiketsu! Densetsu no Yari o Motsu Otoko
Der Showdown! Der Mann mit dem legendären Speer
La batalla cumbre. El hombre con las legendarias artes marciales
Showdown Between the Leaders! The Man with the Legendary Spear!
頂上対決! 伝説の槍を持つ男

REGULAR.description:
With Odin able to predict his every move, Ryozanpaku`s disciple makes a brilliant decision: he quits attacking in the style of Kenichi and starts fighting in the exact styles of his Masters!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die stärkste Verwandlung! Der Rhythmus von Ryouzanpaku!
La transformación para ser el más fuerte. El ritmo del Ryouzanpaku
Saikyou Henshin! Rhythm Ryouzanpaku!
The Mightiest Transformation! The Ryozanpaku Rhythm!
最強変身! リズム梁山泊!

REGULAR.description:
Odin unleashes a power within himself that threatens to crack his mind and body. Kenichi is no longer just trying to survive - he must call upon all he has learned in order to save his friend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El discípulo más impresionante, Kenichi
Shijou Saikyou no Deshi Ken`ichi!!
Shijou Saikyou no Deshi Kenichi
The Mightiest Disciple, Kenichi!
史上最強の弟子ケンイチ!!
Opening 1
Opening 2
Ending 1
Ending 2
Ending 3
Ending 4
English Promotion

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 史上最強の弟子ケンイチ

titles.title: Shijou Saikyou no Deshi Ken`ichi
Kenichi: The Mightiest Disciple
Kenichi: The Mightiest Disciple
史上最強の弟子 ケンイチ
HSD Kenichi
HSDK
Ken`ichi
Kenichi
History`s Strongest Disciple Kenichi
Kenichi, el Discípulo Más Fuerte de la Historia.
Kenichi, o discípulo mais forte da História
Най-силният ученик в историята Кеничи
Сильнейший в истории ученик Кэнъити
史上最强弟子兼一
